org.fcrepo.kernel.modeshape.identifiers

Class HierarchyConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.base.Converter<String,String>
      • org.fcrepo.kernel.api.identifiers.InternalIdentifierConverter
        • org.fcrepo.kernel.modeshape.identifiers.HierarchyConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Function<String,String>

    public class HierarchyConverter
extends InternalIdentifierConverter
    Injects and extracts segments of hierarchy before the last segment of a multi-part identifier to ensure efficient performance of the JCR.
    Since:
    Mar 26, 2014
    Author:
    ajs6f
